name: Guanta Gnomo
description:
Made by team Heigh Ho.

Guanta Gnomo is a VR local Multiplayer game that pits one Vive player as an evil spirit against two to four PC controlled Gnomes.

The Vive player can walk around a real sized room, and grab Gnomes and throw them in the blender

The Gnomes get a head start on the Vive player, and need to find the correct doors in the level in order to exit. Should a Gnome almost be caught, they can stop giving input in order to Turn to stone and become untouchable for the duration of the lack of input.
